Posts.Content: Hi Elaine, I have been taking Herceptin and Arimidex for 3 months and it seems to be working. do not give up. May God bless you. Norma
Posts.Title: Herceptin and Her-2pos Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Elaine, this is Norma again, I just want you to know that I am doing very well with Herceptin and Arimedex, but this is putting on a few pounds. I have to deel with this until september and if all is well I will go to Europe to see my Mom In the meantime hang in there and I will pray for you. Love, Norma
Posts.Title: Herceptin and Her-2pos Breast Cancer
